assessments.status_rationale: No reporting on the Bank of England’s Sept. 18 MPC vote split in today’s news. Coverage centers on the Federal Reserve; outcome awaits the BoE meeting and minutes on 2025-09-18.
The ISM Services PMI for September 2025 has not been released yet; the scheduled release is 2025-10-03.
No August 2025 core PCE print is in the news; the BEA release is due 2025-09-27.
No Freddie Mac PMMS update on 15-year rates to confirm ≤5.85% appears in today’s coverage; deadline is 2025-10-31.
No evidence provided that the ICE BofA US HY OAS has reached ≥4.50%. Market news mentions equities and Fed developments but not HY spreads.
No report of the LBMA Gold Price PM fixing at or above $2,550 in the cited articles; deadline remains 2025-10-31.
EIA storage data for the week ending 2025-09-27 is not yet available; release expected by 2025-10-03.
September 2025 Industrial Production will be released on 2025-10-16; no early figures are reported today.
No mention of a CFPB BNPL enforcement action or consent order in today’s news; window remains open until 2025-10-31.
No confirmation that USD/JPY has closed ≥152.50 in the articles provided. The deadline is 2025-10-31.
